code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import PhoneInput from"../atoms/phoneInput";import SendButton from"../atoms/sendButton";import CodeInput from"../atoms/codeInput";import ConfirmButton from"../atoms/confirmButton";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CertiFormGroup=_ref=>{let{check}=_ref;const[cell,setCell]=useState('');const[isCell,setIsCell]=useState(false);const[code,setCode]=useState('');const[inputCode,setInputCOde]=useState('');const[isCode,setIsCode]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(code!=='')setIsCode(true);if(code==='')setIsCode(false);},[cell,code]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mx-2 my-8 pb-[160px]",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PhoneInput,{setCell:setCell,setIsCell:setIsCell}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SendButton,{cell:cell,setCode:setCode,isCell:isCell})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CodeInput,{setInputCode:setInputCOde}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConfirmButton,{inputCode:inputCode,code:code,isCode:isCode,cell:cell,check:check})]})]});};export default CertiFormGroup;
